segments.text: Is there anything wrong with your food this evening , Miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry to trouble you . But I don't think this fish is fresh . It actually tastes a bit off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , Miss . I'll place it immediately , can I get you another drink , or you wait ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , please don't do that . I'd just like to return it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Miss , but I'm afraid we can't do that . You'll order something else instead . I'd love to suggest the steak , it's the special today , and quite tasty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , then please bring me the steak mediun-rare , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , Miss . I hope you enjoy the rest of your dinner .
segments.speaker: S1
